itunes:title: Episode 582 - Special Guest Mike Ritland
title: Episode 582 - Special Guest Mike Ritland
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Mike Ritland the host of Mike Drop Podcast and discuss the time and effort that goes into training his working dogs, the public response after Conan the dog was welcomed home as a hero after the...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with special guest Mike Ritland the host of Mike Drop Podcast and discuss the time and effort that goes into training his working dogs, the public response after Conan the dog was welcomed home as a hero after the Al Baghdadi raid, and what it was like to go viral overnight after declaring that "Epstein Didn't Kill Himself" in the middle of a Fox News interview.
